version_description:
We have fixed some minor bugs and rare crashes

Thanks for your feedback!

We have fixed some minor bugs and rare crashes

Thanks for your feedback!

- Improved Downloads handling: now you can long tap on links to download files
- Speed Dial: tap Star button to add websites to Speed Dial, long tap on Speed Dial to manage your favorites
- We have added more VPN servers around the world so your connection will always be perfect
- Minor Bug fixing and improvements

- Improved Downloads handling: now you can long tap on links to download files
- Speed Dial: tap Star button to add websites to Speed Dial, long tap on Speed Dial to manage your favorites
- We have added more VPN servers around the world so your connection will always be perfect
- Minor Bug fixing and improvements

Your favorite secure mobile browser just got an update!
We have fixed a lot of small and annoying bugs, in Downloads, Speed Dial, Address bar.

Please leave us a review if you like Aloha Browser

We appreciate your feedback at support@alohabrowser.com

This is our biggest update ever. Aloha Browser now speaks your language. Plus:

VR PLAYER onboard! Plays 360 or VR videos directly from the browser, download them and watch later.

This update includes revamped DOWNLOADS:
- Folders
- Download videos directly from the video player

VPN connection speed improved for some countries.

Please rate Aloha Browser if you like it.
We appreciate your feedback at support@alohabrowser.com

Your favourite Aloha Browser is getting even better. This update includes:

- Check out new Downloads section in Settings!
- Improved battery usage for background downloads
- Various bug fixes and speed improvements

Your favourite Aloha Browser is getting even better. This update includes:

- Check out new Downloads section in Settings!
- Improved battery usage for background downloads
- Various bug fixes and speed improvements

Aloha! We have great news for you:

- You will never miss a finished download again with push notifications.
- We’ve improved downloads handling. That means you are able to download from more websites, and downloaded videos will play correctly.
- Select video quality for downloads (for some websites)
- Today widget for quicker Aloha access.
- Share widget for opening files and links in Aloha. Yes, combined with password or fingerprint protection now you have a secure file vault in your browser!

We also did a lot of under-the-hood improvements and squashed some bugs.

Please rate Aloha Browser if you like it.
We appreciate your feedback at support@alohabrowser.com

Aloha! We have great news for you:

- You will never miss a finished download again with push notifications.
- We’ve improved downloads handling. That means you are able to download from more websites, and downloaded videos will play correctly.
- Select video quality for downloads (for some websites)
- Today widget for quicker Aloha access.
- Share widget for opening files and links in Aloha. Yes, combined with password or fingerprint protection now you have a secure file vault in your browser!

We also did a lot of under-the-hood improvements and squashed some bugs.

Please rate Aloha Browser if you like it.
We appreciate your feedback at support@alohabrowser.com

While we are working on new awesome features, here is an intermediate update:

- new Touch3D actions on app icon: quick access to Downloads
- fixed inline video playing
- fixed some bugs with downloads
- launch speed and overall performance improved
- improving iOS 10.3 support
- some hard-to-find bugs fixed (thanks for your feedback)

Please rate Aloha Browser if you like it.
We appreciate your feedback at support@alohabrowser.com

Aloha! This intermediate update includes:

- new and powerful VR player with easier controls
- sound sync issues with downloads are now fixed
- incomplete downloads are now fixed
- theatre mode for playing 2D videos in VR
- launch time and overall speed improvements
- stability improvements
- lots of minor bugs have been fixed, thanks for reporting!

Aloha! This is the biggest update we’ve ever had! Here is what we’ve done for you:

- iPad version! Now Aloha is a universal app, so you can use it on your iPhone and iPad in native resolution.
- Redesigned user interface for a cleaner look and a better feel (yes, and the new icon too).
- Bigger thumbnails in Downloads: You asked for it, you got it - now your downloads look better and are easier to find. Switch to a brand new Grid view in Settings -> Downloads.
- Downloads button has been moved to the menu bar for a quicker access.
- Group file editing. Manage your files like a pro!
- Lots of smaller improvements for user interface, stability and performance.

We are not stopping here, more features are coming soon!

Please rate Aloha Browser if you like it.

We appreciate your feedback at support@alohabrowser.com

Aloha! The new media player is finally here!
- Picture in picture and background playing: watch and listen while you browse on iPhone (will come to iPad a bit later). Just swipe the player down!
- Shuffle and repeat options
- Swipe up/down to adjust brightness and volume
- Screen lock
- Double tap to zoom
- Choose quality when watch online
- AirPlay 2 support
- Enable/disable VR player

We listen to you and more awesomeness will come very soon. In the meantime, you can now tip developers to speed up new features releases

Please rate Aloha Browser if you like it.
We appreciate your feedback at support@alohabrowser.com

Aloha! In this update:
- We have partnered with AdBlock Plus to give you better and faster ad blocking
- You finally can organize your bookmarks with folders
- You can clear history, cache, cookies, close private tabs on exit
- Share group of files from your private vault
- Overall speed and stability improvements

Please rate Aloha Browser if you like it.
We appreciate your feedback at support@alohabrowser.com

Aloha!
This is not very big yet important bug fixing update. 
We have improved VPN connection handling.
We have fixed some issues with Wi-Fi File Sharing
Also, "Open in new tab" works as desired on iPad.

Please rate Aloha Browser if you like it.
We appreciate your feedback at support@alohabrowser.com

Introducing Aloha Premium! There are plenty of long-awaited new stuff in here! VPN, File manager and lots of extra. Let's dive in:

Huge VPN update:
- You can choose your VPN server location
- You can enable VPN to work with any app on your device
- You can now automatically start VPN with the app launch
- We have added a lot of extra servers worldwide and have improved the speed and connection stability

File manager update: 
- WiFi file sharing - access and transfer your files to and from other devices through WiFi connection
- We have added '...' button so you can manage your files quicker
- It now supports ZIP compression, both ways: you can zip or unzip your files
- You can lock individual folders with passcode, TouchID or FaceID

We have also packed some new amazing themes to choose from.

Try Aloha Premium today for free!

Please rate Aloha Browser if you like it.
We appreciate your feedback at support@alohabrowser.com

Aloha! 
This update will dramatically improve your VPN experience:
- Tap and hold on the shield icon to see quick VPN menu.
- Also, connection speed and stability have been increased for both free and Premium users.

If you haven't already, you may try Premium for free today!
Your support is much appreciated and is playing an important role in our journey for bringing privacy back to you!

Please rate Aloha Browser if you like it.
We appreciate your feedback at support@alohabrowser.com

Introducing Aloha Premium! There are plenty of long-awaited new stuff in here! VPN, File manager and lots of extra. Let's dive in:

Huge VPN update:
- You can choose your VPN server location
- You can enable VPN to work with any app on your device
- You can now automatically start VPN with the app launch
- We have added a lot of extra servers worldwide and have improved the speed and connection stability

File manager update: 
- WiFi file sharing - access and transfer your files to and from other devices through WiFi connection
- We have added '...' button so you can manage your files quicker
- It now supports ZIP compression, both ways: you can zip or unzip your files
- You can lock individual folders with passcode, TouchID or FaceID

We have also packed some new amazing themes to choose from.

Try Aloha Premium for free today!

Please rate Aloha Browser if you like it.
We appreciate your feedback at support@alohabrowser.com

Introducing Aloha Profile!
Create your free secured account with Aloha to backup data and sync between devices.

- restore pass code
- manage your subscriptions
